Dear Maurice:
I have reserved a single room for you at the Urbana-Lincoln
Kb tel in Urbana, for late arrival, December 18. If we knew
which train you*d be taking from Chicago we*d like very much
to meet you, if this would meet with your approval.
The Panama Limited, leaving Chicago at 5*00 is an all-reservation
train which arrives at 6:50. The ...eminole leaves at 5*10 and
arrives in Champaign at 7s25*
If we can be helpful in any other way, you have only to let
us know.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJSshek
cci President David D. Henry
